personal.text1: Raised in provincial Thuringia I love nature and being in nature. But I have also been interested in all kinds of technology and electronics since early childhood. I am also passionate about cinema, writing and culture.
personal.text2: I listen to a lot of dark and atmospheric music, from extreme metal to dark wave to neofolk and post punk. I also like various rock music and electronic music.
personal.text3: I am still interested in philosophy (Cioran, Nietzsche, Camus, Schopenhauer, Hobbes, Sartre, Zizek) after my studies and a little bit (more and more) in visual arts (Grimshaw, Kittelsen, Corot, Bierstadt, Dor√©, Beksinski, Friedrich, Lessing, Giger) as well.
personal.text4: Fitness and weight training are also essential to my life.

footer.text1: Coded in Webstorm. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed with Netlify.
